name: 6 BOIZ - Save the kidz
description:
The giant Sale event is happening! Chaos is raising! People are beating each other to get their hands of those 90% off items... Multiple kids are reported lost in the middle of the mall...

You just start your job as a hero who helps the lost kidz at the mall. Go punch some guyz and save the kids.

NOW GO! SAVE THE KIDz
